definition: the external structure of a vehicle
details:
noun
- the external structure of a vehicle
= example: the external structure of a vehicle
- a resonating chamber in a musical instrument (as the body of a violin)
= synonyms: soundbox
- the property of holding together and retaining its shape
= example: the property of holding together and retaining its shape
= synonyms: consistency, consistence, eubstance
- the main mass of a thing
- the entire structure of an organism
= example: the entire structure of an organism
= synonyms: organic structure, physical structure
- a natural object consisting of a dead animal or person
= example: a natural object consisting of a dead animal or person
= synonyms: dead body
- the body excluding the head and neck and limbs
= synonyms: trunk
- the central message of a communication
= example: the central message of a communication
- a group of persons associated by some common tie or occupation and regarded as an entity
= example: a group of persons associated by some common tie or occupation and regarded as an entity
- a collection of particulars considered as a system
= example: a collection of particulars considered as a system
- an individual 3-dimensional object that has mass and that is distinguishable from other objects
= example: an individual 3-dimensional object that has mass and that is distinguishable from other objects
